questions.task: how Go's goroutines and channels facilitate concurrent programming
questions.task_wav: local file location or cloud wav path for a question
questions.//status_comment: status can vary from PENDING -> WAITING_FOR_AGENT -> WAITING_USER -> COMPLETED
questions.//timeout_comment: Time within which this question answer loop must end say agent takes 30 + user takes 1 munute, then max timeout time is 90 seconds
questions.//order_comment: The order in which question is being asked by agent
questions.//llm_score: Based on the question and the answer provided by the user, llm like gemini, llama will give a score between 0-1
questions.//llm_response: llm response to the question and answer
